== Pallippuram (627820) ==

Pallippuram is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 427 hectares and harbouring 617 households with total population of 2450 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 1178 and female population is 1272. Scheduled Caste Population is 296 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627820<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
